gov.ca.dsm2.input.model
Class Channels

java.lang.Object
  gov.ca.dsm2.input.model.Channels
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Channels
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

A container for all channels getChannels() in DSM2 model. Allows for quick retrieval of channel given the channel id getChannel(String). Also maintains a list of up nodes getUpChannels(String) and down nodes getDownChannels(String) The container maintains the list in the order added.

Author:
psandhu
See Also:
